item.title: China Going After Dirty Money Creates Bitcoin Momentum
item.description:
China Going After Dirty Money Creates Bitcoin Momentum

With the Yuan depreciating even further, and dirty money being sniffed out, there are very few remaining options for people who want financial freedom. Exciting things are happening in China, albeit money launderers will not agree with that statement. Beijing authorities are collecting all of the dirty money in the country.

item.title: Can the Federal Reserve Really Save the US Economy?
item.description:
Can the Federal Reserve Really Save the US Economy?

Is the US Federal Reserve still capable of reducing negative effects from recessions and other economic shocks? Not without drastic measures, says a critic. Also read: The Federal Reserve Gets on Facebook, Greeted by Angry Bitcoiners The answer is yes - at least, according to a paper by the Fed's own deputy director of its research and statistics division.

item.title: Verizon Applies for Blockchain Patent in Strongest Push Yet
item.description:
Verizon Applies for Blockchain Patent in Strongest Push Yet

US communications giant Verizon has filed a Blockchain patent for its digital media rights following three years of investigative research. Also read: New FCC Rules Could Block Your E-Wallet Verizon, the largest communications company in the US, made the application in May but has declined to comment on its plans behind the move.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Pegging Our Scalp Trades - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Pegging Our Scalp Trades - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this morning. It is Tuesday morning, and time to take a look at the bitcoin price for the first time today.

item.title: PayPal Freezes Bundy Ranch Accounts, Will They Switch to Bitcoin?
item.description:
PayPal Freezes Bundy Ranch Accounts, Will They Switch to Bitcoin?

The Bundy Ranch has had its PayPal accounts blocked. The Bundys, a US family of cattle ranchers in Nevada, rose to fame (notoriety?) in 2014 for refusing to pay the federal government for grazing rights on federal lands.

item.title: Kir Kelevra: Decentralized Centralization Is Coming
item.description:
Kir Kelevra: Decentralized Centralization Is Coming

A short while ago, ForkLog conducted an own investigation of affairs around Ethereum Classic, mostly inspired by customer claims against exchanges. This time, we publish a translation of a private opinion of crypto-traders and bitcoin enthusiast Kir Kelevra as to Ethereum Classic and other processes that have shaken the industry over the recent months.

item.title: Updating my online wallet to not rely on the Blockchain.info API
item.description:
Updating my online wallet to not rely on the Blockchain.info API

I had a website which allowed me to send and receive bitcoins. To achieve this, I used the Blockchain API to process notifications of received bitcoins and the same to process sending Bitcoin to other addresses. Due to the fact that Blockchain forced me to change my calling method because they changed the API using node.js I was considering to move away from them.

item.title: Responsible Gaming Policies Make Online Casinos Better
item.description:
Responsible Gaming Policies Make Online Casinos Better

Online casinos, despite their fun-filled and entertaining outlooks, have been interpreted as dark places for players with gambling addiction. Passion and addiction have a thin line but an important difference between each other. While passion is defined as a strong liking towards a certain hobby or work, addiction simply indicates psychological dependencies on passion.

item.title: Bitwala Launches Bitcoin Wallet, Adds Support for Dash and Steem | Finance Magnates
item.description:
Bitwala Launches Bitcoin Wallet, Adds Support for Dash and Steem | Finance Magnates

Netherlands-based international money transfer service and Bitcoin debit cards provider, Bitwala, has revealed a number of new features to its platform. The company now offers both more Bitcoin related functions and support for new Altcoins. Join the industry leaders at the Finance Magnates London Summit, 14-15 November, 2016. Register here!

item.title: PSA: Coinbase Referral Spam Exploits Bitcoin URLs - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
PSA: Coinbase Referral Spam Exploits Bitcoin URLs - Bitcoinist.net

Be careful not to misspell the domain of your favourite exchange or crypto information site - the chances are that it'll redirect you to Coinbase Registration Page. No - set your tinfoil hats down, Coinbase isn't trying to syphon traffic away from their competitors.
